template: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the {industry} space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.
filled_prompt: Generate one single-sentence plain-English prompt describing an end-to-end content campaign task in the healthcare space that involves research, multi-format content creation, consistency across channels, and measurable goals; output only the prompt text under 45 words.

message.content: Research and produce a multi-format healthcare campaign on a specific topic that is consistent across channels and designed to achieve measurable audience engagement goals.
message.reasoning_content:
Hmm, the user wants a concise prompt under 45 words for a healthcare content campaign. The task must include research, multi-format creation, cross-channel consistency, and measurable goals.  

I need to pack all these elements into one smooth sentence. Let me start with the action—"research and produce"—to cover both initial research and creation. Then specify "multi-format campaign" to imply varied content types. Adding "consistent across channels" ensures alignment. Finally, "measurable goals" ties it to outcomes.  

The phrasing should flow naturally while hitting every requirement. Keeping it healthcare-focused but broad enough for flexibility.
